lead_paragraph: On a visit to Phnom Penh, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said that trials were necessary for Cambodia to “confront its past.”
snippet: On a visit to Phnom Penh, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said that trials were necessary for Cambodia to “confront its past.”

headline.main: In Cambodia, Clinton Advocates Khmer Rouge Trials
headline.seo: Clinton Says Khmer Rouge Trials Should Continue
headline.print_headline: In Cambodia, Clinton Advocates Khmer Rouge Trials
